snippet: Edward J. Snowden, the American former intelligence technician who leaked thousands of classified files, was originally granted one year of residency.
abstract: Russia grants Edward J Snowden three-year residence permit; former National Security Agency contractor leaked classified government documents and then fled to country.
lead_paragraph: Edward J. Snowden, the American former intelligence technician who leaked thousands of classified files, was originally granted one year of residency.

headline.main: Snowden Said to Be Allowed 3 More Years in Russia
